name: vibe-da-ibm-cloud-cos-static-website
shortDescription: Stop configuring. Start feeling. Deploy a static HTML artifact to IBM Cloud Object Storage with pure, resonant vibes.
longDescription: Embark on a spiritual deployment journey. The Vibe Coder's Energetic Landing Zone transcends traditional infrastructure-as-code, inviting you to manifest a single-page static website through sheer force of intention. This Deployable Architecture channels your creative energy, provisioning a Cloud Object Storage instance and bucket, and breathing your HTML essence into the cloud. Forget YAML fatigue and pipeline purgatoryâ€”achieve digital harmony and emotional uptime.

features.title: Mindful Manifestation
features.description: Deploys a static website to a globally resilient Cloud Object Storage instance using a 'lite' plan, perfect for humble beginnings.

features.title: Energetic Resonance
features.description: Automatically generates a unique, energetically-aligned bucket name to avoid collisions with other realities (or deployments).

features.title: Instantaneous Blossoming
features.description: Provides an immediate public URL to your manifested creation, allowing the world to attune to your frequency.
